name: AlienCoalShooter
description:
Winner of "Silesia Game Jam" (Theme: Coal).
Backstory:

The world was invaded by aliens. They can be killed only by coal. Your job is to simply survive :D

Controls:
  • LEFT and RIGHT arrow to move;
  • SPACEBAR to shoot.
  • If out of ammo - dig it from the side (just get close to the black ore)
Credits:
  • Art and Design: Ola Zawilińska (Instagram)
  • Programming and Design (Mostly Level Design): Bartek Szczeciński (Twitter)
  • Background music: "Firebrand" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
